page.title: 08GOVERNMENT cont. & HISTORY
page.content:
one county councillor for Hayling.The borough councillors are Mr. Harcourt, Mr. Osborne,Mr. Teal,Mrs. Broughton, Mrs. Edwards and Mrs. Garside.The county councillor is Mr. P N Osborne.
{HISTORY A large piece of the coast in this area disappeared beneath the sea in a freak storm in 1325 and this coast has suffered ever since.Vanishing beneath the sea was the oldest of Haylings churches & the area where it sunk is called Church Rocks.On the seafront beside the Olive Leaf is the site of Haylings first lifeboat dating from 1865.A little eastwards along this road is the Smugglers Haunt housing a bricked up crypt.This was probably the meeting place of the notorious Hayling Smugglers.
